```{r}
#| message: true
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
```

* pivot to the longer format
```{r}
longer <- billboard |>
  pivot_longer(
    cols = matches("^wk.*"),
    names_to = "week",
    values_to = "rank",
    values_drop_na = T
  )
longer
```
* change week values to keep only the first number found

```{r}
longer <- longer |>
  mutate(week = parse_number(week))
longer
```
